body:
There is a generic_transfer_manager which shares most of the implementation.

If however there are more subtle issues that isn't easy to fix up by swapping in GenericTransferManager, you can feel free to leave it as it is and leave it to me to merge them later instead.

If however there are more subtle issues that isn't easy to fix up by swapping in GenericTransferManager, you can feel free to leave it as it is and leave it to me to merge them later instead.
body_text:
There is a generic_transfer_manager which shares most of the implementation.
If however there are more subtle issues that isn't easy to fix up by swapping in GenericTransferManager, you can feel free to leave it as it is and leave it to me to merge them later instead.
